name: funded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
fund
C1 to provide the money to pay for an event, activity, or organization: The company has agreed to fund my trip to Australia. The new college is being privately funded (= money for it is not being provided from taxes).
More examplesFewer examplesWe'll need accurate costings before we can agree to fund the scheme.Chissano said Western governments should stump up the cash to fund land redistribution.The Channel Tunnel was jointly funded by the French and British.The project is being held in abeyance until agreement is reached on funding it.He funds his extravagant lifestyle by developing property.
